Question: My Arcade CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
My Arcade

Product 1: Gamestation Portable (DGUNL-7065)

- Feature 1: Portable handheld retro gaming system
- Feature 2: Designed to evoke classic gaming nostalgia

Product 2: Pole Position - Racing Arcade (DGUNL-7022)

Product 3: Pole Position - Pocket Player Max (DGUNL-7035)

Product 4: Atari Super Player (DGUNL-7037)

Product 5: Atari Mega Player (DGUNL-7038)

Product 6: PAC-MAN Joystick Player (DGUNL-7073)

Product 7: Ms.PAC-MAN Joystick Player (DGUNL-7074)

我的街机

产品1：Gamestation Portable（DGUNL-7065）

- 特点2：设计旨在唤起经典游戏的怀旧感
